thread.title: First Child in the Woods: Caregiver and Infant/Young Child Walk
thread.title_full: First Child in the Woods: Caregiver and Infant/Young Child Walk

title: First Child in the Woods: Caregiver and Infant/Young Child Walk
text: Description Join us for the perfect introduction to nature. This one-hour hike will enable your child or children, birth to 5 years old, to gently discover the natural world around them and give you skills to confidently lead explorations of your own. This is an opportunity to explore the changing nature and beauty of Arcadia with your youngster each month. The program fee is waived for infants under 1 year of age. Please call (413) 584-3009 for more information. Checking registration status. When - Sat, Jul 06, 2024 10:00 am - 11:00 am Who Families - children 0 - 5 years Cost - Adult Members $5 - Adult Nonmembers $10 - Child Members $5 - Child Nonmembers $10 Where Location: Arcadia Wildlife Sanctuary, Easthampton - Questions? Contact us: - [413-584-3009](tel:413-584-3009) [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#98f9eafbf9fcf1f9d8f5f9ebebf9edfcedfaf7f6b6f7eaff) Instructors - Kelly Walbert - Teacher Naturalist Instructions Meet in the Arcadia visitor center. Dress comfortably for the weather as we will be outdoors on the trails. Bathrooms will be available on site.
